function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on COVID-19 risk reduction measures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Incorporate COVID-19 risk reduction measures into sustainability efforts","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, touchless technologies, UV-C lighting","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Architects, building owners, urban planners"},{"Description":"Failure to integrate sustainability into COVID-19 risk reduction measures","Impact":"Missed opportunity for sustainable development","Mitigation":"Integrate sustainability principles into COVID-19 risk reduction measures","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, green building materials, efficient waste management systems","People":"Community, environment","Owner":"Government, developers, environmental agencies"}]}
